title: What to Do When YouTube Warns You About Your Ad-Blocker
description:
YouTube plus an ad-blocker is a fantastic experience. You can watch video after video to your heart’s content, without constant interruptions from loud, occasionally unskippable commercials. But ads are how YouTube makes its money, so they’re not too happy when people use ad-blockers to get avoid them.

Read more...

title: The Best Exercises to Do With a Landmine Attachment
description:
The “landmine” (or angled barbell) attachment is a hidden gem in many gyms, and it opens up all kinds of possibilities that regular dumbbells and barbells don’t offer. For example, you can work the same muscles as an overhead press without aggravating your shoulders, if that’s an issue for you.

Read more...

title: Why You Need Vent Extenders This Winter
description:
Putting furniture over vents is a bad idea. Blocking the flow of warm or cool air makes your heating and air conditioning system work that much harder, and reduces its effectiveness. Placing your bed or couch over a vent can also make it feel like you’re sitting or sleeping in an oven (or a refrigerator). And if the…

Read more...

title: You Should Cook Your Pasta in Leftover Bean Broth
description:
For a country that could fit inside the state of Nevada, Italy seems disproportionately affected by hyper-regionality, particularly when it comes to food. Take pasta e fagioli, for instance, which translates to “pasta and beans.” Easy enough, but travel the country from the top down, and you’ll find tons of variations…

Read more...

title: This BirdBike E-bike Is on Sale for Over 50% Off Right Now
description:
You can get a BirdBike e-bike on sale for $999.97 right now (reg. $2,299). It comes with a top speed of 20 MPH and up to 50 miles of range, as well as a 500W motor and 36V removable battery. The e-bike comes with an embedded LED dash display that shows you how fast you’re going, the distance you’ve traveled, and which…

title: Why You’re Already Seeing Ads on Prime Video
description:
Streaming was originally sold to us as an ad-free escape from traditional cable: You pay a company like Netflix a certain amount per month, and you get to watch their content without interruption.

Read more...

title: Is the Novavax COVID Vaccine Actually ‘Better’?
description:
Lots of people are hearing about Novavax, the fourth COVID vaccine option in the U.S., for the first time, but it’s been authorized for use as a primary vaccine series since early 2022. Previously, it was only available for those who hadn’t received a mRNA vaccine—an alternative for those who either couldn’t or…

Read more...

title: How to Grow (Good) Weed Indoors
description:
If you don’t live in a sunny climate where cannabis grows well without much intervention—in other words, if you live in most of the country—you can be forgiven for not trying to grow your own weed.

Read more...

title: Make an Autumnal Beurre Blanc With Apples and Sage
description:
The French lean pretty heavily on butter—and we let them, because they do wonderful things with it. Beurre blanc, for example, is a sauce made with a shallot-infused wine and vinegar reduction, a healthy slug of cream, and two whole sticks of butter. Of course it tastes good—all creamy, tangy, and rich—but you can…

title: Today’s NYT Connections Hints (and Answer) for Tuesday, October 17, 2023
description:
